# wordpress_site_settings (Resource)

Manages general WordPress site settings like title, description, timezone, and more.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# WordPress Site Settings Resource Example

resource "wordpress_site_settings" "basic" {
  site_name        = "My Terraform Site"
  site_description = "IaC all the way"
  admin_email      = "admin@example.com"
  timezone         = "Europe/Tel_Aviv"
  date_format      = "F j, Y"
  time_format      = "g:i a"
  start_of_week    = "1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `admin_email` (String) The site administrator email.
- `date_format` (String) The format for displaying dates.
- `site_description` (String) The site's tagline (blogdescription).
- `site_name` (String) The site's name (blogname).
- `start_of_week` (String) Numeric day the week starts on (0=Sunday, 1=Monday).
- `time_format` (String) The format for displaying times.
- `timezone` (String) The timezone (e.g., 'Europe/London').
